entry.def: Hebrew is a language that was spoken by Jews in former times. A modern form of Hebrew is spoken now in Israel.

example.tran: 他说一口流利的希伯来语。

entry.tran: 希伯来人（旧时指犹太人）
entry.def: In former times, a Hebrew was a Jewish person.

example.ex: ...the exodus of the Hebrews from Egypt.

entry.def: Hebrew means belonging to or relating to the Hebrew language or people.

means.word_mean: 1. the ancient Canaanitic language of the Hebrews that has been revived as the official language of Israel
2. a person belonging to the worldwide group claiming descent from Jacob (or converted to it) and connected by cultural or religious ties
1. of or relating to or characteristic of the Hebrews;
2. of or relating to the language of the Hebrews;
